tool_description: Scans motherboard components, slots, connectors, and traces to identify physical damage, connection issues, and component failures.

motherboard_form_factor.description: Motherboard form factor (ATX, microATX, miniITX, E-ATX, proprietary)

socket_type.description: CPU socket type (LGA1151, AM4, LGA1200, AM5, etc.)

ram_slots_count.description: Number of RAM slots on motherboard

check_capacitors.description: Check capacitors for bulging or leakage

scan_traces.description: Scan for damaged traces or burn marks

test_onboard_components.description: Test onboard audio, network, and other integrated components

error_messages: Unsupported form factor: Use ATX, microATX, miniITX, E-ATX, or proprietary.
Invalid socket type: Provide a valid CPU socket identifier.
Invalid RAM slot count: Must be between 1-8 slots.
Invalid expansion slots: Provide valid slot types (PCIe_x16, PCIe_x8, PCIe_x4, PCIe_x1, PCI).
Motherboard not accessible: Cannot access motherboard for physical inspection.
usage: Specify motherboard_form_factor, socket_type, ram_slots_count, and expansion_slots. Enable various scanning options to check specific components and connections.

trace_damage.description: Damaged traces or burn marks found
